Title: Golden Treasure
Actors: Erdenetsetseg Bazarragchaa, Munkhbold Tsend-Ochir, Chinzorig Purevjav, Damdin Sovd
Plot: In the land of Sukhbaatar in the town of Dariganga a new member has arrived in champ Tseveen's household. The family gets bigger with three girls already they add a long anticipated boy "Taivan" into the family.
